entry.title: Local holomorphic Euler characteristic and instanton decay
entry.summary: We study the local holomorphic Euler characteristic $\chi(x,\mathcal{F})$ of sheaves near a surface singularity obtained from contracting a line $\ell$ inside a smooth surface $Z$. We prove non-existence of sheaves with certain prescribed numerical invariants. Non-existence of instantons on $Z$ with certain charges follows, and we conclude that $\ell^2$ poses an obstruction to instanton decay. A Macaulay 2 algorithm to compute $\chi$ is made available at http://www.maths.ed.ac.uk/~s0571100/Instanton/
entry.arxiv:comment: 15 pages. Revision history: v1: Original. v2: minor corrections, as published
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Pure Appl. Math. Q. 4 no. 2, Special Issue: In honor of Fedya Bogomolov, Part 1, 161-179 (2008)
